trim.if: AND ware_date between TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 and TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1

mapper.sql:
SELECT order_num, ware_date, partcode, partname, name,ware_quantity,price,closing_date FROM (select rownum rn,order_num,ware_date ,partcode,partname ,name,ware_quantity,price,closing_date from (SELECT o.order_num order_num, w.ware_date ware_date, p.partcode partcode, p.partname partname, cp.name name, w.ware_quantity ware_quantity, c.unitprice*o.order_quantity price, w.closing_date closing_date
from tbl_part p , tbl_contract c, tbl_company cp, warehousing w, purchase_order o, tbl_support s WHERE p.partcode = c.partcode and c.code = cp.code and c.contractno = o.contract_num and o.order_num = w.order_num and c.partcode = s.partcode and o.support_num = s.supportno and w.ware_date is not null and w.return = 'N'
order by order_num desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) WHERE rn > ((#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount})
mapper.select: select*from(select o.order_num order_num, w.ware_date ware_date, p.partcode partcode, p.partname partname, cp.name name, s.deliverydate deliverydate , cp.business_number business_number,cp.comemail, cp.comemployee, w.ware_quantity ware_quantity, o.order_date order_date, c.unitprice unitprice from tbl_part p , tbl_contract c, tbl_company cp, warehousing w, purchase_order o, tbl_support s WHERE p.partcode = c.partcode and c.code = cp.code and c.contractno = o.contract_num and o.order_num = w.order_num and c.partcode = s.partcode and o.support_num = s.supportno and w.ware_date is not null and w.return = 'N')WHERE order_num=#{order_num}
mapper.update: update warehousing set closing_date=sysdate where order_num=${order_num}
